interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled Review Date: 2022/03/14 Store: AOA STUDIO Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'} Review Text: These makeup sponges are super soft which makes it great for a flawless makeup application.

The flat side allows me to dab my liquid foundation before evenly applying it over my face. It also allows me to use my foundation more sparingly to avoid being wasteful. But I particularly love the precision tip which enables me to effortlessly contour & blend concealer around my eyes, nose & lip areas.

These AOA Studio Collection Makeup sponges makes applying makeup perfectly easy. Review Title: Super Soft & Blends well! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ZILING Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 4x4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked 150% Density Brazilian Straight Lace Front Closure Wigs Human Hair 18 Inch ZILING {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.34 x 9.06 x 2.48 inches; 6 Ounces'} The hair is soft and layered so it feels more like 130 density. It measured longer than 18” but it has short hairs throughout as shown in the photos. The lace is more of a light brown with small knots and the hairline is pre-plucked. The cap is well constructed and it’s small head friendly (circumferences less than 22”). Overall, it’s soft with a silky straight texture but the density is just too thin for my personal preference. Soft but thin AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled AOA STUDIO {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'} These makeup sponges are super soft which makes it great for a flawless makeup application.

The flat side allows me to dab my liquid foundation before evenly applying it over my face. It also allows me to use my foundation more sparingly to avoid being wasteful. But I particularly love the precision tip which enables me to effortlessly contour & blend concealer around my eyes, nose & lip areas.

These AOA Studio Collection Makeup sponges makes applying makeup perfectly easy. Super Soft & Blends well!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Type Preference:** Prefers straight styles, particularly human hair.
- **Density Concern:** Values adequate hair density; finds thinner options unsatisfactory.
- **Quality Indicators:** Looks for products that are soft, tangle-free, and well-constructed.
- **Design Appeal:** Appreciates modern aesthetics and has a preference for pre-plucked hairlines.
- **Fit Requirement:** Has specific fit needs, indicating a head circumference of less than 22 inches.
- **Experience with Brands:** Engages with brands that focus on quality, though experiences may vary leading to mixed reviews.
- **Critical Reviewing:** Provides detailed feedback highlighting length discrepancies and construction quality over time.
- **Makeup Product Engagement:** Recently purchased a makeup sponge set, indicating an interest in high-quality beauty tools. Offers detailed feedback on makeup application, particularly valuing softness and precision in products. Demonstrates a discerning approach to beauty tools, favoring those that enhance usability and efficiency.

This summary showcases a user dedicated to quality in both hair products and beauty tools, emphasizing their preference for items that enhance performance and ease of use while maintaining a critical eye towards product construction and effectiveness.
